meta_description: Discover the National Corvette Museum in Bowling Green, KY—where America’s Sports Car comes to life. Explore 100+ historic Corvettes, hands-on exhibits, and the Corvette community’s epicenter. Plan your visit today.
hours_text:
Hit enter to search or ESC to close

# Visit the National Corvette Museum

__Menu

  * Admission
  * Directions & Hours
  * Hotels
  * Shopping & Dining
  * Membership
  * Exhibits
  * Simulators

## Museum Hours

### Open 7 Days a Week

#### Current Hours

**March 1 – December 31**  
Open Daily, Sunday–Saturday 9:00 AM–5:00 PM CT

**January 1–February 28**  
Sunday–Saturday 9:00 AM–5:00 PM CT, CLOSED Tuesdays

_All times listed are in the Central Time zone. The last admission tickets are sold by 4:30 PM CT. Tickets can be purchased on-site or online. We are closed on New Year’s Day, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Eve and Christmas Day._

**National Corvette Museum Address:**  
[350 Corvette Dr, Bowling Green, KY 42101](http://web.archive.org/web/20250910205159/https://maps.app.goo.gl/pGyXh8Hh1UPKXvVi6)

[Get Tickets](http://web.archive.org/web/20250910205159/https://tickets.corvettemuseum.org/event/museum-admission/calendar)

## Admission & Pricing

#### Adult Museum Ticket

#### Ages 13-61

## $25

[Get Tickets](http://web.archive.org/web/20250910205159/https://tickets.corvettemuseum.org/event/museum-admission/calendar)

#### Senior Museum Ticket

#### Ages 62+

## $23

[Get Tickets](http://web.archive.org/web/20250910205159/https://tickets.corvettemuseum.org/event/museum-admission/calendar)

#### Youth Museum Ticket

#### Ages 5-12

## $14

[Get Tickets](http://web.archive.org/web/20250910205159/https://tickets.corvettemuseum.org/event/museum-admission/calendar)
